title: Raising Selfless Kids
itunes:author: Guest Sami Cone
itunes:summary:
Blogger Sami Cone offers parents practical advice for teaching their children to overcome selfishness in a discussion based on her book, "Raising Uncommon Kids".

Receive Sami Cone's book "Raising Uncommon Kids" for your donation of any amount: https://donate.focusonthefamily.com/don-daily-broadcast-product-2022-07-01?refcd=1439304

Get more episode resources: https://www.focusonthefamily.com/episodes/broadcast/raising-selfless-kids/#featured-resource-cta

If you've listened to any of our podcasts, please give us your feedback: https://focusonthefamily.com/podcastsurvey/
